metadata.name: DNS TXT Answer with Possible Execution Strings
metadata.comment: Detects strings used in command execution in DNS TXT Answer

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 2 AND lower(query.type) = lower('txt') AND (exists(answers, x -> contains(lower(x.rdata), lower('iex'))) OR exists(answers, x -> contains(lower(x.rdata), lower('invoke-expression'))) OR exists(answers, x -> contains(lower(x.rdata), lower('cmd.exe')))))

output.summary: Detects strings used in command execution in DNS TXT Answer
